/dockerfile:
FROM hayd/ubuntu-deno:1.5.2

EXPOSE 3000
WORKDIR /usr/app

RUN deno install -qAfn vr --no-check https://deno.land/x/velociraptor@1.4.0/cli.ts

COPY src/deps.ts ./src/deps.ts
RUN deno cache --no-check --unstable src/deps.ts

ADD . .
RUN deno cache --no-check --unstable src/server/server.ts

ENTRYPOINT [ "/usr/local/bin/vr" ]

CMD ["local"]
/docker-compose.yml:
version: '3.7'

services:
  api:
    build:
      context: ./
      dockerfile: dockerfile
    image: api:dev
    container_name: api
    restart: always
    volumes:
      - ./:/usr/app
    ports:
      - 3000:3000
    environment:
      - PORT=3000
/scripts.yml:
scripts:
  local: deno run --allow-net --allow-env --allow-read src/server/server.ts
  build: docker-compose build
  start: docker-compose up
  dev: docker-compose up --build
/src/deps.ts:
export * as Drash from 'https://deno.land/x/drash@v2.5.2/mod.ts';
export { config as env } from 'https://deno.land/x/dotenv/mod.ts';
